opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States

opinion:
(2006)

NORRIS, DIR., AR DOC, ET AL.
v.
DON W. DAVIS

06A7

Supreme Court of United States.

July 5, 2006.

The application to vacate the stay of execution of sentence of death entered by the United States District Court for the Eastern District of Arkansas on June 26, 2006, presented to Justice Alito and by him referred to the Court, is denied.
